name: Pintwin
description:
Pintwin was made in a day for  GameJamPlus3

It's a combination of a pinball and twin-stick shooter.

You play as a ball that can control it's movement by shooting in the opposite direction.

There are 2 launchers, controlled separately.

WASD - controlls the first launcher;

Arrows - control the second launcher.

ESC - to open menu.

Shoot in the opposite direction you want to move, imagine it being a rocket and launchers acting as engines.

The launchers have a limit of how long they can shoot, then need to recharge.

The red balls are enemies, avoid them or you'll loose health.

The purple balls, give points if you hit them with your body. Shoot them to charge their them, if they reach the maximum they will give a lot of points.

The small green balls are difficult to hit, so they give more points than the purple ones.

Don't fall down or you'll loose the game!

Everything besides audio was done by myself.
